question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022? Return None if no answer is found.
final_answer: The projects completed before 2022 are the Civic Center Way Improvements and Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure.
sub_answers: Projects completed before 2022 include Civic Center Way Improvements and Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure.

Capital Improvement Projects (Design)

Marie Canyon Green Streets
(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) A hydrology report was prepared and will be used to size the pre-
manufactured biofilters. City staff is reviewing multiple biofilter
manufacturers for filters that will work in the proposed project area. It is
anticipated to have a final design by March 2022. The project will be
advertised for construction bids shortly after this date.

(cid:190) Updates:

Date prepared: October 21, 2021

Subject:

Capital Improvement Projects and Disaster Recovery Projects Status
Report

RECOMMENDED ACTION: Receive and file report on the status of the City’s current and
upcoming Capital Improvements Projects and Disaster Recovery Projects.

DISCUSSION: Staff will provide a status update on the following active projects in the
Fiscal Year 2021-2022 Capital Improvement Program:

Capital Improvement Projects (Design)

Marie Canyon Green Streets
(cid:190) Updates:

Capital Improvement Projects (Completed)

Civic Center Way Improvements

(cid:190) Updates: The contractor has completed the planting material maintenance
period as described within the project documents. Council accepted this
project as complete at the September 13th City Council Meeting.

Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure

(cid:190) Updates: The contractor has completed the storm drain improvements in the
Civic Center Way are. The improvements modified the existing concrete
channel underneath Civic Center Way by adding a 3’ concrete curb adjacent
to the existing flap gates. The new curb prevents brackish water intrusion

Page 4 of 8

Agenda Item # 4.A.












into the City’s Civic Center Stormwater Treatment Facility. This project is
scheduled to be accepted by the Council at the January 24, 2022 meeting.
